title: Inventory Management Sysytem
description: Developed a ReactJS and Firebase web app for inventory management, invoice creation/editing, and receipt generation with real-time sync and a user-friendly interface.

title: Ganpati Tours Website
description: Built a responsive tourism website for Ganpati Tours with tour packages, image galleries, contact info, smooth navigation, user-friendly interface and an engaging user experience for easy trip planning.

title: Foodie's Hub
description: Developed a responsive food delivery website showcasing menus, food items, order options, and a clean, user-friendly interface for smooth browsing and ordering experience.

title: Financial Cafe
description: Developed a modern, responsive website for Financial Cafe offering financial insights, services, blogs, and tools with clean UI and smooth user experience for better engagement

title: Real Estate
description: Developed a responsive real estate website with clean UI, fast loading, dynamic property listings, user-friendly interface, and smooth navigation for an engaging user experience.

title: Fit-Club Gym Web page
description: Browse, book fitness classes, track progress, achieve goals.

title: Smart Contact Manager
description: Built a secure contact management web app using Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and MySQL with features like role-based access, CRUD operations, image upload, search, pagination, and Spring Security for authentication.

title: Weather Forecast Web app
description: Accurate forecasts, real-time updates, simple interface for quick access.
